Chaygaon - Dakuwapara | On 23/08/2022 around 10:30 A.M water resource department informed that erosion occurred at Dakuwapar. Circle Officer , Field Officer along with water resource department visited the site and erosion was seen. The water resource department report the erosion on 23/08/2022. | 0

Mankachar - Fulerchar Pt-II, Kalir Alga | As per report received from In-charge control room, Hatsingimari W.R Sub-division, an Erosion causing damaged of land measuring length-800 M Breath- 8 M. Occurred at Kaliar Alga & Fulerchar Pt-II on 23/08/2022 | 0
